content:
hello everyone, could you please suggest me where i can find the x12 to fhir mappings?
Thank you.

hello all,
MVP-270-eligibility-benefit-request-guide.pdf
Page 10 - 16 explains the 270 fields information. i want to map these fileds to Fhir resources. i searched, but didn't fined the mappings. please help.
thanks in advance.
